(+13 for winning) |c|☆Star Wheel|gg |c|☆useemstohavefun|gg |l|☆useemstohavefun |player|p1| |c|☆Star Wheel|aight one more gen 9 for the day |c|+35Q71N|Isn't it noon for you? |c|+35Q71N|Or morning |c|+35Q71N|Not noon |c|+35Q71N|Morning |c|☆Star Wheel|morning lol |c|☆Star Wheel|I'm not that deranged |c|+35Q71N|Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmh |c|☆Star Wheel|I try to keep my weekday games to an hour or two most of the time |c|+35Q71N|So you actually do work, wow |c|☆Star Wheel|i know it is surprising |c| critsomnia|smart person, keeping your sanity in tact |c|☆Star Wheel|see crit knows whats up |c|+35Q71N|Guy who literally has "morally deranged" as an alt '-' |c| critsomnia|haha been a while |c|☆Star Wheel|LMAO |c| critsomnia|been laddering on this now though |c|☆Star Wheel|that's great |c| critsomnia|good to have an account in the back to learn other formats on |c|+35Q71N|(To give context, Ben is one of my closest friends here) |c|+35Q71N|(We met on the bdsp ladder and he beat me, starting the classic action of bullying towards me) |c| critsomnia|nice to meet you, hopefully you get to 3rd today and if not i wish you the strength to not load another one up |c|☆Star Wheel|lol thanks yall |c|+35Q71N|Oh he was already top 3 |c|+35Q71N|But then I started spectating him and lost |c|☆Star Wheel|yeah I was 2 at the end yesterday |c|+35Q71N|They told me the guy in first place is quite good |c|☆Star Wheel|I actually have a win streak on him rn |c|+35Q71N|Are you japanese, by chance? |c|☆Star Wheel|think I've won my last 3 against him |c|☆Star Wheel|part |c|+35Q71N|Wait, fr? |c|+35Q71N|I thought you had korean origins since you visited the country this summer |c|☆Star Wheel|nah that's my fiance |c|+35Q71N|I didn't expect you had japanese roots :o |c|☆Star Wheel|:) |c|+35Q71N|You have a fiancè as well? |c|☆Star Wheel|mhm |c|+35Q71N|Oh man, I can't make fun of you anymore |c|☆Star Wheel|lmaooo |c|☆Star Wheel|you can |c|+35Q71N|(I will) |c|+35Q71N|Wedding when? |c|☆Star Wheel|next fall hopefully |c|+35Q71N|Nice :) |c|☆Star Wheel|yep very excited |c|+35Q71N|Does your fiance know you are a ps addict? |c| critsomnia|grats on the wedding! |c|☆Star Wheel|thank you! |c|☆Star Wheel|and yes she does lol |c|☆Star Wheel|she doesn't really understand how much I play tho |c| critsomnia|when did you tell her if i may ask |c| critsomnia|haha same |c| critsomnia|i warmed her up with half-truths aswell |c|+35Q71N|It took you one year Ben :') |c| critsomnia|hahah it really did |c|☆Star Wheel|lol she knew from the start |c|☆Star Wheel|I've been playing showdown for like 8 years now |c|☆Star Wheel|would play in college class too |c|☆Star Wheel|so she saw everything lol |c|+35Q71N|Interesting |c|+35Q71N|So she tolerates you despite your daily descent into madness |c|☆Star Wheel|yeah that's how it goes |c| critsomnia|you're a stronger person than i am, i needed to tell because we were going to live together |c|☆Star Wheel|that's where all my luck actually goes :) |c|☆Star Wheel|lolllll |c|☆Star Wheel|yeah that's when it got more real for sure |c| critsomnia|got to go, see you both another time! |l| critsomnia |c|☆Star Wheel|nice talking! |c|+35Q71N|Cya Ben! |l|☆Star Wheel |player|p2|
